item.title: Why I Renamed My Git Branches From Master to Main
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: It’s been a while since GitHub changed the default branch name from master to main. If you’re interested in the deeper background and how GitHub are not the only platform implementing this change, check out the statement of the ‘software freedom conservancy’ on 23/6/2020. What I welcome most about this movement is that it got way easier to rename the default branch on GitHub, which used to be a major PITA.
